definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Now when the noodles that wears the madam of Hou Ye begs a madam to help and backs this wedding.
sentences.chinese: 現下當着侯爺夫人的面，求夫人成全，退了這頭婚事。

sentences.english: Before getting sick is a , wife lord need not worry, now already all good.
sentences.chinese: 之前病了一場，妻主不用擔心，現下已經全好了。

sentences.english: When the longed-for help was so near, how could he relinquish hope?
sentences.chinese: 現下所渴望的幫助就在眼前，他怎能放棄希望呢？

sentences.english: Kaki is now ready to continue to take her music on the road.
sentences.chinese: 柿色祏器釉現下準備繼續在道路上拿她的音樂。

sentences.english: And now, you had me fall two times, so we are quits.
sentences.chinese: 現下你摔了我兩次，咱們大家扯了個直。
